Hero.title: Fullstack Dev passionate about smooth UI/UX, heavy-duty frontend with React/Next, solid backend with Node/Nest. Building digital products that not only run well but also have beautifully optimized functions and are loved by users

Introduce.content1: Full-stack developer with hands-on experience from freelance work and personal projects. Proficient in Node.js, NestJS, React, and modern tooling such as Docker and Redis. Experienced in building and deploying real-world web applications with a strong focus on performance, scalability, and user experience. Recently worked with microservices combined with micro frontend architecture and gRPC, developing a solid foundation in distributed system design and operation.
Introduce.content2: I enjoy actively exploring and applying new technologies in real projects, especially leveraging AI to enhance development workflows, improve logic design, and boost creativity, including approaches such as vibe coding. I am motivated to work in collaborative and creative environments where I can contribute to meaningful products, share knowledge, and tackle complex challenges with a user-centered mindset. In the long term, I aim to take ownership of core features, make strong technical contributions, and help shape impactful software systems.

Experience.p1: Developed an informational and content management website for the organization. Handled everything from UI/UX design to backend implementation, ensuring performance optimization and easy content management.
Experience.p2: Built a modern blog system for an agency project. Focused on delivering a sleek UI, responsive layout, and SEO optimization for better online presence.
Experience.p3: Developed the official website for Unien company. Ensured a professional corporate image, responsive design, and optimized performance across devices.
Experience.p4: Personal freelance project oriented towards building a startup. Responsible for product development, exploring new technologies, and managing the entire development lifecycle.
Experience.p5: VIA Exhibition Self-Exhibition Project builds an exhibition website. Responsible for product development, product design, delivery and management of the entire development lifecycle.
Experience.p6: Atom Report App aims to deliver a reporting and data analytics platform. Responsible for designing the system, developing core features, and managing the full product development lifecycle.
Experience.p7: The VSS project is a personal project focused on building a microservice-based system combined with a micro frontend architecture for task management and system monitoring. Responsible for designing the architecture, developing independent services, implementing microFE-based UI, and managing the entire product development lifecycle.
Experience.p8: This is a comprehensive financial dashboard featuring four main views: Map (global economic events visualization), List (detailed economic calendar), Indices (worldwide stock market indices), and News (real-time updates from The Guardian). The application aggregates data from multiple sources to provide users with a holistic view of global financial markets and economic conditions.

Technical.title: Technical expertise
Technical.content: I have developed a diverse skill set in my field, focusing on modern web technologies and best practices.

t1.q: I write well-structured, documented code following best practices and design patterns.

t2.q: I focus on creating fast, efficient applications with optimized assets and code splitting.

t3.q: All my projects are fully responsive, ensuring a great user experience on any device.
